short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses the selected text to return a best result from HockeyDB, NHL.com, and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finds a best result in a new tab for the selected text in HockeyDB, NHL.com, ESPN, and more. Works to quickly lookup players, teams, seasons, drafts, articles, and other info.

A few examples of strings that will link to appropriate and detailed HockeyDB pages:

Sidney Crosby
Crosby
1997 Draft
Sharks roster
2019 Boston players
2017 playoffs

Useful for quickly finding a statistics page for a player, standings page for a team, or historical references.
